Name: AllMyNotes Organizer
Other objects: Alarms, check-boxes, bullets, phones, advanced links

Name: BasKet Note Pads
Remarks / other features: Adding, managing notes by category, autosave

Name: CintaNotes
Remarks / other features: Tagging and searching for tags, tag hierarchy

Name: Circus Ponies NoteBook
Other objects: Alarms, check-boxes, address book links, keywords, numbering, priority, due date, formulas in tables
Remarks / other features: Tagging, automatic indexing, sketching, diagramming, voice annotated notes, screen clipping, link or embed files

Name: ConnectedText
Other objects: Scripting of pages with Python and other scripting languages.
Remarks / other features: LaTex, Scripts, RSS Feeds, Transclusion, Directed Graphs and Flowcharts by GraphViz, many other features.

Name: Day One
Other objects: tags, bullets, numbering, line, programming code snippets
Remarks / other features: editable note metadata (date/time, location, weather, motion activity, music playing, step count)

Name: DéjàClick
Remarks / other features: Annotate live web pages via DéjàNotes and share scripts

Name: Org-mode (Emacs)
Other objects: Advanced linking, bullets, tags, checkboxes, full spreadsheet, embedding of programming code, formulas, markup
Remarks / other features: Major mode of Emacs; uses plain-text; includes ToDos, spreadsheet, deadlines, encryption, reminders, agenda, calendar

Name: Evernote
Remarks / other features: Business and personal notes integrated in same client; businesses have control over business notes, but cannot see personal notes

Name: Gnote
Remarks / other features: Port of Tomboy to C++; wiki-style linked notes

Name: Google Keep
Remarks / other features: Notes can be shared with other Google Keep users.

Name: Intellinote
Remarks / other features: Includes task management and collaboration features

Name: IPython Notebook
Remarks / other features: Part of IPython shell; allows for programming code, output and annotation to be combined in single interactive environment

Name: KeyNote NF
Other objects: OLE objects; "virtual nodes" which integrate and edit the content of external plain-text or rich-text files; internal links; mirror nodes.
Remarks / other features: Text processing; tree numbering and sorting; custom tree icons; node checkboxes; checkbox filtering; search filtering; reminder alarms; compressed or encrypted notebooks; auto-minimize and/or auto-lock when idle; quick access key for fast notes; additional scratchpad; autosave of up to 9 previous file versions; automatic clipboard capturing; read-only notebooks or notes; macros; templates; text shortcuts; plug-ins; bookmarks; custom keyboard shortcuts; portable through "Options" setting

Name: MyInfo
Other objects: OLE, bullets, numbering, page breaks, advanced links
Remarks / other features: Tags; filters; calendar; reminders

Name: MyNotex
Remarks / other features: Activity lists; tags; notes management by subject; encryption with AES or GPG; multilingual

Name: Notational Velocity
Remarks / other features: Instant open and searching

Name: Notizen .NET
Remarks / other features: Tree notes can stick on desktop; encryption; FTP upload

Name: Personal Knowbase
Remarks / other features: Passwords; portable

Name: TiddlyWiki
Remarks / other features: Plugins; user scripts

Name: Tomboy
Remarks / other features: Reminders; to do-lists; formulas in LaTeX

Name: WikidPad
Remarks / other features: personal wiki software
